title: Timbuktu Market
description: A bustling marketplace offering local crafts, food, and goods.

title: Great Mosque
description: An ancient mosque showcasing stunning architecture and history.

title: Desert Oasis
description: A serene oasis perfect for relaxation and nature lovers.

title: Cultural Museum
description: Explore the rich history and culture of Timbuktu.

title: Library of Timbuktu
description: Home to ancient manuscripts and historical documents.

title: Festival Square
description: A vibrant square hosting cultural festivals and events.

title: River Niger View
description: Enjoy breathtaking views of the River Niger.

title: Artisan Village
description: Discover handmade crafts and meet local artisans.
